Guard Fred:
You've done it! Show me the Suspicious Fragments.
Oh no, this... this... Sakum's scale! So, the monsters have become ferocious because of Sakum?! There is no time waste - sprint back to Gludio, inform Grand Magister Esrandell in the Einhasad Temple of our findings, and ask him to send the strongest he's got here. I will remain behind and uncover the beast's location!
